DOC.detailed_description: The i-Share cohort set study various important aspect student ' health well understand early mechanism contribute occurrence common disease represent important public health burden . The i-Share cohort fund `` investment future grant '' French National Research Agency ( ANR-10-COHO-05-01 ) aim recruit 30000 student University Bordeaux , additional partner university France abroad ( www.i-share.fr ) . The bio-Share study biological repository embed within i-Share study , aim collect blood sample ( genetic analysis well measurement biomarkers ) subset 2000 i-Share participant volunteer ancillary project . The goal set platform enable investigator future study biological determinant condition affect young adult test certain hypothesis pathophysiology mechanism underlie disease occur young age late life ( early exposure may also impact late onset disease ) . The biobank comprise follow biological material : buffy coat , plasma , serum , whole blood , red blood cell , DNA , RNA . Levels fast glucose lipid level ( total cholesterol , HDL-cholesterol , LDL-cholesterol , triglyceride ) return participant .
DOC.criteria: Be iShare participant Bordeaux ( entails student register Bordeaux University Academic Institutes Bordeaux age 18 year understanding French , affiliated French social security Having fill first online iShare questionnaire Having sign write informed consent Pregnant breastfeeding woman , Persons personally give consent adult guardianship .
